Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista IGG Subclass 1 Flex reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista IGG Subclass 2 Flex reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista IGG Subclass 3 Flex reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista IGG Subclass 4 Flex reagent cartridge
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D, and E Immunological Test System
Methodologies: Quantitative measurement of immunoglobulin G subclasses
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens Dimension Vista IGG Subclass 1-4 Flex reagent cartridges for quantitative measurement of IgG subclasses on the Dimension Vista System
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic tests for quantitative measurement of immunoglobulin G subclasses 1-4 in human serum, heparinized plasma, and EDTA plasma to aid diagnosis of plasma cell antibody forming abnormalities in conjunction with clinical and other laboratory findings
